titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Hepatitis B Awareness Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
5/2/2007--Introduced.
Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of National Hepatitis B Awareness Week; and (2) raising awareness of the consequences of untreated chronic hepatitis B and the urgency to seek appropriate care.
